start_message: Hello! bot 'Virtual Mentor' - a unique assistant that makes learning and finding answers easy and convenient. /questionand I will forward your question to Telegram channel 'IT Campus NEIMARQ Q. programming, developing, marketing or any other field, I will connect you with a community of professionals ready to help and share insights. Virtual Mentor and get instant support for your projects and learning purposes.

information_authors: Developers, testers and people who helped or somehow contributed to the development of the bot: Developer SerKin0 (Sergey Skorokhodov) - the main and currently the only developer of the bot; Tester GordStep (Gordey Stepushov) - the person who helps with testing all SerKin0 bots Tester Aip (Andrey Pronin) - a person who tested the Armenian language in a bot against his will Virtual Mentor, then you can subscribe to the Telegram channel of the bot developer (Skorokhodov Sergey) {}.
edit_profile: If you wrote the data with an error, then write a command from the proposed list, and then write a correction: /first_name ... /second_name ... /age ... /description ... /language ... (ru - Russian, en - English, de - German, ar - Armenian, fr - French) Example: /language en
start_registration: In order for you to unlock the functionality of the bot, you need to register
Keep in mind that this name can be used in official documents!
write_description: Write your short description, as with the name, take it seriously.
Advice: If you have nothing to write, then you can simply write a phrase of life or a quote from the Great
finish_registration: You have completed registration! Now you can go to the NEIMARCK group ()
error_edit_data_not_reg: You cannot change the profile settings because
if_not_found_need_question: If you did not find the question you need, then try to shorten or reformulate the question.
empty_text_question: You wrote a question without text
load_photo_or_video_meme: First, upload an image with a meme.
write_description_meme: Write a description of the meme, if you want a meme without a description, write or press the 'Skip' button
finish_load_meme: Okay, I saved your meme, I hope it's not there, but if we get a complaint, we'll let you know and remove the meme.
download_error: You must download at least something
